transArray.content: The room is not big, but it is clean and tidy. It is very comfortable to live in. There is also a refrigerator, which is very convenient. The store's service attitude is also very good. They thoughtfully gave me a small gift when I checked in, and two bottles of warm mineral water when I left. It was very heartwarming to stay in the winter. There is Carrefour nearby, so it is very convenient to have dinner or supper in the evening.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and sharing your stay experience with us. The hotel is located near the West Fourth Ring Auxiliary Road and is at Wuluju Station of Metro Line 6, with convenient transportation. I'm glad to know that the hotel's health services left a good impression on you in your review. Before guests check in, we will conduct room rounds, clean the rooms and change the sheets to ensure that all guest supplies are changed "one for each guest". Please feel free to check in. It is our responsibility to provide you with high-quality services. Thank you for your support to us. We will continue to do a good job in all aspects and believe that you will have a better stay experience next time you check in. The hotel looks forward to your visit again and wishes you a happy life!
